# Ranged Disarm (Feat)
## Overview
You can disarm a foe from a distance.

**Prerequisites:** Dex 15, [[Point-Blank Shot (Feat)|Point Blank Shot]], [[Precise Shot (Feat)|Precise Shot]], base attack bonus +5.

**Benefit:** Choose one type of ranged weapon with which you are proficient. You can make a disarm attempt with this weapon as long as your target is within 30 feet.

You can gain this feat multiple times. Its effects do not stack. Each time you take the feat, it applies to a new ranged weapon.

When using this feat, a character gains no benefit from the [[Improved Disarm (Feat)|Improved Disarm]] feat.

**Special:** A fighter may select Ranged Disarm as one of his fighter bonus feats.

**Source:** Complete Warrior (WotC), pg. 103
